body:
Yes, 3 is in Python.

Suppose you pass a tensor back into Python. In that case, no copies happen at all, and then you can blat the tensor data directly into the Python APIs you want to use.
body_html:
Yes, 3 is in Python.

Suppose you pass a tensor back into Python. In that case, no copies happen at all, and then you can blat the tensor data directly into the Python APIs you want to use.
body_text:
Yes, 3 is in Python.
Suppose you pass a tensor back into Python. In that case, no copies happen at all, and then you can blat the tensor data directly into the Python APIs you want to use.
